target_sources(SdkFmt
    PUBLIC FILE_SET HEADERS FILES
        "fmt/args.h"
        "fmt/base.h"
        "fmt/chrono.h"
        "fmt/color.h"
        "fmt/compile.h"
        "fmt/core.h"
        "fmt/format-inl.h"
        "fmt/format.h"
        "fmt/os.h"
        "fmt/ostream.h"
        "fmt/printf.h"
        "fmt/ranges.h"
        "fmt/std.h"
        "fmt/xchar.h"
)
